The claim stated that Mayor Muriel Bowse: restaurants, grocery stores, gas stations, and convenience stores to close on January 4, 5, and 6 to discourage Trump supporters from gathering in D.C.
The expert: s verdict highlighted that while at least one hotel, Hotel Harrington, had voluntarily closed during the mentioned time period, there was no specific order from Mayor Bowser regarding the closure of hotels, grocery stores, gas stations, or convenience stores.
